availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alfred R. Gaunt (Clerk, Carroll Circuit Court, and farmer)

body.p: Born and raised in Carrollton, Carroll County, Kentucky, where he resided until his death. Son of John Gaunt. A farmer. Elected Carroll Circuit Court clerk in 1862. Later storekeeper for the district's Internal Revenue system. Married Sarah Catherine Strother. Re-married Narcissa, after Sarah's death. Father of John S. Gaunt and James M. Gaunt.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Carrollton post office, p. 29.

Find A Grave, Entry for Alfred R. Gaunt (1815-1885), Find A Grave Memorial # 22723185, Gaunt Cemetery, Carrollton, Carroll County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=22723185&ref=acom (accessed 7 May 2017).
